description: Universal tagging policy - applies to ALL AWS resource types discovered via Resource Groups Tagging API. Use applies_to: null or [] for wildcard (all resources).

required_tags.name: CostCenter
required_tags.description: Department for cost allocation - used for chargebacks and budget tracking

required_tags.name: Owner
required_tags.description: Email address of the resource owner - who to contact if issues arise

required_tags.name: Environment
required_tags.description: Deployment environment - affects cost allocation and risk assessment

required_tags.name: Application
required_tags.description: Application or service name - for grouping related resources

optional_tags.name: Project
optional_tags.description: Project identifier for tracking project-specific resources

optional_tags.name: Compliance
optional_tags.description: Compliance framework this resource must adhere to

optional_tags.name: DataClassification
optional_tags.description: Data sensitivity level - for compliance and security

supported_resource_types._comment: This section documents supported resource types. Empty applies_to means ALL types are checked.
